turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Wait a second.  You're Steven Reign? You're big time.  You own all them big hotels.  What are you doing in Hong Kong?

turns.speaker: STEVEN REIGN
turns.text: I'm just in town for the weekend, taking in the sights.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Stevie, how's it going my man?  Somebody get a picture, we can use it for a mug shot.

turns.speaker: STEVEN REIGN
turns.text: Detective Carter, you always seem to show up where you don't belong.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Lemme ask you something, Steven.  And I want the truth.  Is there any way I can date your daughter?  Just dinner and a movie, maybe go listen to some jazz...

turns.speaker: STEVEN REIGN
turns.text: Vegas has been my town for 30 years.  I crawled out from under the first rock. Do you really think you can intimidate me here?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're right, you're a smart guy.  Most counterfeiters only get ten cents on the dollar.  But this is an even swap.  Pure genius.

turns.speaker: STEVEN REIGN
turns.text: You play games with me, Detective, and you'll lose every time.  Don't forget. The odds are always in favor of the house.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I warned you about playing that shit when I'm in the car.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: That was my CD.  Don't you ever touch a Chinese man's CD.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Did you see the way those girls drove off?  I did you a favor.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Those girls drove off because of you.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: All I did was invite them for a drink.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You invited them to get naked and sacrifice a small goat.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I said that?  Which word was "goat?"

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You owe me a copy of the Beach Boys Greatest Hits, Volume Two.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Don't be giving me attitude, Lee.  I've been here three days and we haven't done shit.  We haven't been to a club, haven't even talked to a girl.  I'm on vacation, and I want some mu-shu.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Mu-shu?  You're hungry?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Not Mu-shu.  Mu-shu.  I want to see some women.  Now stop playing dumb and show me the shu!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Of course not.  My Superindendent invited us to a club tonight.  Big party.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Don't be messing with me, Lee.  I will kick your ass.  I'll hit you so hard you'll end up in the Ming Dynasty.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Carter, would I lie to you?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That's what I'm talking about.  A real Hong Kong night club.  You want an Altoid?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You better take one.  Your breath has been a little funky all day.  Let me look at you.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Just relax and don't worry about a thing.  I'll hook you up in there.  You got condoms?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Take this.  It's a Magnum.  You can fold it in half.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'll meet you at the bar in ten minutes. They don't like tourists in here, so try to blend in.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Blend in?  I'm two feet taller than everyone here.  Where you going?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Bathroom.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Carter, get off that stage!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Are you kidding, they love me.  I'm a star, Lee.  A god to these people!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: This is a gangster bar, we're here undercover.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I knew you were lying.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Damn it, why are you ruining my night? I'm just starting to have fun.  Well fine then, go ahead, pull your badge and do your thing.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No, we're here for information, to find out where a man named Ricky Tan is.  We must tread softly and keep our ears open.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Tread softly?  Who taught you how to roost a bar?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Carter, you don't understand.  These men are Fu-Cang-Long Triads.  Part of the most deadly gang in China.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Man, are you crazy?  You think that scares me?  I'm from  L.A.  We invented gangs.  We were having gang wars before anybody even thought about it.  We get royalties from other gangs.  Now gimme your badge and gun and I'll show you how it's done.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.  You are a civilian.  In China, I am Michael Jackson, and you are Toto.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You mean Tito.  We had  Toto for dinner last night.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What'd I say?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You just said you're their worst nightmare - and to line their mothers up for a milking.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Shit.  C'mon, get up here and help me out.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: All I wanted was a little mu-shu.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Try to land on your feet.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You lied to me.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're sorry.  I got somebody's old chopsticks stuck in my ass, so don't tell me you're sorry.  Just take me home.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No time.  There was an explosion at the American Embassy today -- two American translators were killed.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm telling you right now, I'm tired of this shit.  There's two billion Chinese - let one of them be your partner.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: This won't take long.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: And that's how you use the LAPD choke hold.  Now start practicing and don't make me come back here!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Carter...you ready to have some fun!?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Just follow my lead and act like a tourist.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I am a tourist.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: How you doin'?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: My friend is on vacation, from America. I want to show him a good time.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: She said I could pick any girl I want.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Well, hurry up.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey!  You don't break in front of a black man in a buffet line.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What's wrong?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Over there -- that's Ricky Tan.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That's Ricky Tan?  He's four feet tall. I'll go over with you right now, shake him down.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: This is a very dangerous man.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm a dangerous man.  You're not gonna ruin my massage because of some midget in a house coat.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'm calling for back up!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Goddamn you got a small ass.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Don't look at my ass!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Where are you going?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Back to Heaven on Earth.  I need my damn passport back.  I'm going home.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Fine.  Go home.  Who needs you.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Why you mad at me?  You needed back-up, so I backed you up.  I was about to take out Ricky Tan and those bodyguards.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Stop!  I'm sick of your bullshit!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: My bullshit?  I'm not the one who goes to a karaoke bar filled with gangsters! I'm not the one who goes to massage parlors to bust crime lords!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's my job!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're pathetic, man.  When's the last time you had some fun?  When's the last time you took a night off, had a date?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I have plenty of dates.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Really?  When's the last time you had some Mu-shu  Let's hear it, Lee, when was it?  Year of the rat?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You would never understand my life. You're not Chinese.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: And you ain't black!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Carter?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Who died?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Detective Yu?  Never met him.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Not Yu.  You!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Do you understand the words that are coming out of my mouth?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Nobody understands the words that are coming out of your mouth.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What, leave you alone so he can cap you?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'm okay, you go.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Why the hell should you believe him?  He had us beat up.  Naked.  That's nasty shit.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Remember I told you my father was a policeman?  Ricky Tan was his partner for ten years.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What the hell is going on here?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What are you gonna do about it, grasshopper?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'll bitch slap you into Bangkok.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Give me your best shot, you flat assed mama's boy.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Don't be talking about my mama.  Or my ass!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I heard your mama pulls a rickshaw.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.  She's a school teacher.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're not very good at this, are you?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Good at what?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Forget it.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Five years ago, my father was Chief Inspector working a big international smuggling case.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Ask me if I give a shit.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: He found out his partner, Tan, had been working for the Triads all along.  Before my father could prove it, he was killed in the line of duty.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: How the hell did Tan get away with it?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: All the evidence against him disappeared, the smuggling case was unsolved.  Tan resigned and went over to the Triads openly.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: This is about your Daddy's death?  Hell, Lee, you know my father died on the job. You could have told me...  This is about more than all that, isn't it?  This is about your Daddy's last case, right?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No, no, that would be crazy --

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You thought the "Customs Agents get blown up" and "smuggling" and "Ricky Tan" and you put it all together and came up with a five year old case. That's why you didn't tell me what we were doing...

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I thought you'd think it was crazy.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: IT IS CRAZY!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I know.  I know.  I am sorry.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: So are you getting on the plane or not?!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Come on, we still got time to order the Kosher meal.  Always get the kosher meal, they bring it first.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I cannot go to LA...

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It sounds impossible --

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You said --

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: -- but if somebody gave me the chance to square up my father's death, I'd go to hell to do it.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You want to figure out why they killed your Daddy, get on the plane.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Why LA?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I guess you're going to have to trust me on this one.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I should go back.  Ricky Tan mentioned a boat in Hong Kong Harbor...

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Lee, let me introduce you to the Carter Theory of Criminal Investigation: Follow the Rich White Man.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Follow the Rich White Man?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Almost, but you've got to say "Rich White Man" all run together like it's one word.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Follow the RichWhiteMan...

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Not bad.  Now every crime, somewhere, has a rich white man taking his cut. Every single one.  Now in our case, we know the rich white man is Steven Reign.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Big hotel billionaire.  He was on Ricky Tan's boat ordering Hu Li around just before Ricky got smoked.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: How do you know he's our man?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Because when the shooting started he was way too cool.  See most white people, when there's shooting, they either hide in a toilet or start screaming high pitched like "Aaaahhh!!! Aaaahh!!!!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You sound like that all the time.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Black people keep their cool when the shit goes down.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Maybe.  But not like Asians.  We never panic.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah, what about when Godzilla was coming?  You people were screaming your asses off.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Just tell me where I can find this Steven Reign.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: The same place you find all RichWhiteMen.  Gefilte Fish.  Lox and bagel.  I love this stuff.  Here, try it with a smear.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Yeah, that's definitely the woman from Ricky Tan's boat, and she's staying in his suite at his hotel, I told you this would work out.  They still just talking?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: He just left.  Kissed her on the cheek.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: He'll be back soon.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: How do you know?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Look at her.  Now, wake me in an hour, I'll take over.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Carter, there's something I have to tell you.  You were right about what you said in Hong Kong.  All I do is work.  Never take a day off.  It's all I have right now.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, I didn't mean to call you pathetic.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: The truth is, I haven't had any mu-shu in six months.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You pull a muscle or something?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: My fiancee left me over the summer -- a month before our wedding.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm sorry, Lee.  Why did she leave you?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's a long story.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Let me guess, she couldn't handle the cop thing -- never knowing if you were dead or alive.  I've seen it a million times.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.  It was my singing.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Excuse me?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: She hated my voice.  Said it drove her crazy.  I sang to her all the time - in bed - in the shower - I thought she liked it.  She finally told me it was driving her crazy.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: She's just standing around -- not doing much.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Just don't fall asleep.  Sooner or later something's gonna happen.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'll try to stay awake.  It's so boring.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Slow down, baby.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What did you say?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Nothing.  I said nothing.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Is it hot in here?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hot?  I'm freezing my ass off.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'm gonna go in the hall and get a bucket of ice.  You want some ice?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What's going on?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: She's getting undressed.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Gimme the binoculars.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.  It's not right.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Gimme the binoculars or I will shoot you.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What's she doing?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Oh, sweet glory hallelujah...

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I don't want to hear this.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Skirt just came off.  She's in black bra and panties -- Victoria Secret Spring Catalogue, page 27 -- wait a sec - there's a tattoo on her left thigh... it looks like Snoopy.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Snoopy?  I love Snoopy.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: She just took her hair down.  Now she's going for the bra -- the clasp is in front -- she's using both hands.  You better get that ice.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Wait a sec - what the hell is that between her legs?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: She's reaching into her panties -- something is strapped to her leg.  Oh, God...please don't let it be a dick.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No, I don't believe this shit -- it's a microphone.  Lee, she's wired...

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I don't understand?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: She's walking back towards the door.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Pick it up!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's your turn!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I don't need a turn!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Wait!  There's people down there!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: There's people up here!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Get it out of here!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Take it!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I wouldn't do that!!!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's a bomb.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Let me see it again?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: We can help you.  I'm a detective in Hong Kong.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Secret Service Agent Carter.  This is my calling, Lee. Give me six months and I'll be in Washington protecting a white guy.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: We both know you would never take a bullet for someone else.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: They don't know that.  What are they gonna do, try and shoot the President during the interview?  I'll bet Isabella can pull some strings.  You saw the way she was staring at me.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: She never even looked at you.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're just jealous 'cos the girl picked me.  I'm tall, dark and handsome, you're third world ugly.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I am not third world ugly.  Women like me, they think I'm cute.  Like Snoopy.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Snoopy is about six inches taller than you.  I'm sorry, Lee, you never had a chance.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Are you okay?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What's the first thing I told you -- never trust nobody.  How could you fall for that shit?  I knew she was dirty.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: She saved our lives.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: For how long?  Face it, Lee, she's playing both sides.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Look, man I'm sorry.  I know you got a thing for her.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Shhh, my head hurts.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm about to be killed and you "Shhh" me!  This wasn't my case, Lee.  Ricky Tan didn't kill my father, the Fu-Cang Long are not in South Central.  I didn't have to help you.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Why did you help me?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It doesn't matter.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'm not used to having a partner.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: We are not partners.  Between your daddy, my daddy, and the beating I just took, as far as I can tell all partners get you is dead.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Well we're not friends.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You got that right.  And we ain't brothers.  Maybe we should just end this right here.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Fine with me.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I won't talk to you, you don't talk to me.  We'll die in peace.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: See you in the next world.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I don't believe in reincarnation.  So I won't see you in the next world.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Fine.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I believe in heaven.  You people believe in heaven?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes.  We have heaven.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Is it the same heaven, or is it a Chinese heaven?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What's a Chinese heaven?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I thought it might be like those five foot and under basketball leagues.  They don't let everybody in.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I think we should stop talking.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Fine by me.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You thinking about that girl that dumped you?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: If she was the right girl, you'd be thinking about her.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Mind your own business.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: How was the sex?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: There was no sex.  She was very traditional.  We were waiting until we were married.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You're kidding.  No sex?  Nothing?  No mu-shu?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No mu-shu.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What about a little king pao chicken?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No kung pao chicken.  Never.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Steamed dumplings?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Once in a while, steamed dumplings.  But only when she was drunk.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That's rough, man.  If I don't get steamed dumplings once a week, I go crazy.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Tell me the truth, Carter.  Do you think I have a good voice?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Are you serious?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Forget it.  It doesn't matter.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: As long as you're asking...I think you have a pretty good voice.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I knew it.  What does she know.  You want me to sing something?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That depends.  How do the Fu-Cang-Long usually kill their victims?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: They'll probably torture us first, shock our privates, then put two bullets in our eyes and one in the back of the head.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Go ahead.  Sing your ass off.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Very nice.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's focus.  Every opponent has a weak spot.  You ignore everything around you, and put all your energy into one perfect strike.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'll remember that next time I'm fighting a box.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hello, Benjamin.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Who's Benjamin?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Benjamin Franklin, he discovered electricity.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: A Chinese man discovered electricity.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No Chinese man discovered electricity.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes he did.  He also invented the bicycle.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Now that I believe.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: We're slowing down.  This must be it.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: End of the line.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You've been a good friend, James Carter.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Oh no you don't.  Don't you be getting corny on me, Lee.  I'll kick your ass from here to Compton.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You could never kick my ass.  You mama's boy.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Don't you talk about my mama.  That's more like it.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Vegas...

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Lee.  I just got an idea how someone could launder a hundred million dollars in cash.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Red Dragon.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That was the name of Ricky Tan's boat.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Let's go.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Wait a second.  We can't go in like this.  Look at this place, we gotta look fly.  We gotta Mac out.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What is Mac out?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Follow me my Asian brother.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Couple?  No, you got it wrong, there's no couple here.  Just two single police officers working a very dangerous case.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes.  We have lots of big men chasing us.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That looks exactly like my Uncle Darrell.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Buddha is the symbol of luck and good fortune.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Buddha is the symbol for fat and lazy. The man has the biggest tits in Asia.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Carter...here comes the rich white man.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Wait here.  I'll handle this.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Lee, what the hell are you doing?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Dancing?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Dancing?  I'm out here trying to strong arm Steven Reign, putting my life on the line, and you're up here dancing with some bimbo.  Did she have a friend?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It was Isabella.  She says the plates are in the soft count room.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Isabella?  Are you crazy, man?  She almost got us killed.  She's setting you up again!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.  I'm going to find out.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Wait a second.  There's guards all over the place.  You'll need a distraction.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'll go to the craps table, make a big scene.  When security comes over, you make your move.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Try to keep them busy for five minutes.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'll give it my best shot.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Lee!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: MMMMMM!!!!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Why didn't you tell me you had a bomb in your mouth?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I did!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: No you didn't!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes I did.  I said MMMMMM!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Ricky Tan is alive.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What?!?!

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: We have to get to the Penthouse.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You go after Ricky.  I got this.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Carter...

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Just GO!

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Lee, wait a second.  It's not worth it, man.  He's making you do this.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's worth it to me.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: We made it, man.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I saw that.  She kissed you, didn't she? You played it cool, though.  Walking away, never looking back.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: She's going home to New York.  I need some ice.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: That your gate down there?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I'm this way.  I guess this is goodbye.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I guess so.  Thank you, Carter.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: You take care of yourself, Lee.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Your father's badge?  No way, man.  I can't take this.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's okay.  I can finally let it go.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What is this?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: About fifty grand.  I won it at the tables.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No, Carter.  I can't take this.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: It's okay, I got lots more.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: They owe us, man.  That's the least they can do.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: This money is evidence.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Come on, Lee.  Stop being a cop for five minutes and live it up.  There must be something you want.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I always wanted to go to Madison Square Garden.  See the Knicks play.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: New York City?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: First class.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: The Plaza Hotel?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: A little Mu-shu.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Some Kung-Pao?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: I could use a little vacation.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Amen to that, brother.

turns.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT STERLING
turns.text: Quite a night, Inspector.  Ricky Tan was our only bait, and now he's gone.  You finally got your revenge - at the expense of a U.S. Government investigation.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: What "revenge" is he talking about?

turns.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT STERLING
turns.text: I don't know if the Fu-Cang-Long paid you to get rid of Tan, or whether it was a pure vendetta killing -- but you're off this case.  I don't ever want to see you again, you got that?

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Hey, you, Secret Service Man, what are you --

turns.speaker: SPECIAL AGENT STERLING
turns.text: Stay out of it, Carter.  You're going back to L.A.

turns.speaker: CARTER
turns.text: Fine with me.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: I know who you are, Inspector Lee.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Then you know I'm not walking away from this case.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Is this a payoff?

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: No.  It's a sample.  You guys ever heard of the Superbill?

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: It wasn't hard to spot the fakes until this past year.  Then Tan got hold of one of a kind Swiss made hundred dollar plates -- and started making superbills.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: And Hu Li killed him for the plates.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: Yes.  They've printed and shipped one hundred million dollars, and there's only one way to spot a fake.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: Put your arms around me.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Excuse me?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: What's going on?

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: I need your help.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Last time you needed my help I ended up in the back of a truck.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: I'm undercover.  I had no choice.  You have to trust me.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: You move well.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Just trying to make it look real.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: Look over there.  That's the eye in the sky room.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: Behind me is the soft count room.  We're pretty sure the plates are back there.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Why don't you go get them?

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: If I'm wrong then my cover is blown.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: The Secret Service almost busted Reign at his casino in Macao, but the place burned down before we could move in.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: How do I know I can trust you?

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: Dip me!

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: I'm asking for real now -- will you help the Secret Service?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: No.  But I'll help you.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Are you okay?

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: I'm fine.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I didn't know which side you were on.

turns.speaker: ISABELLA
turns.text: Now you know.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: Master Ching taught me.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: The Praying Mantis school, in Bejing?

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: No.  Freddy Ching's, in Crenshaw.

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: What are you doing hanging out with Baby Duck?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Baby Duck?

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: That's what we all used to call him when he was a kid -- cause he was always quacking.  Never shut up.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Do you still have the bills?

turns.speaker: KENNY
turns.text: I still have my lunch money from third grade.

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: Lee, there was a bombing at the American Embassy.  Two American translators were killed.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Any leads?

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: We think it's Ricky Tan.  If you don't want to take the case, I'll understand.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: It's my responsibility.

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: Lee, this is Special Agent Sterling from the United States Secret Service.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: The Secret Service?  Why?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: All he wanted was some mu-shu.

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: Are you okay, Lee?

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: Lee, we just got a call from the harbor patrol.  Ricky Tan is throwing a little party on his boat tonight.  Victoria harbor.  If you don't want to...

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Did you tell Sterling?

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: Let him find out on his own.  I want the Hong Kong police handling this.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: SUPERINDENDENT CHIN
turns.text: Escort Detective Carter to the airport --

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: I'll take him.

turns.speaker: RICKY TAN
turns.text: Lee, I've missed you, brother.  I heard about the two Americans, I'm so sorry, you must be under great pressure.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: You must come with me for questioning.

turns.speaker: RICKY TAN
turns.text: Despite what people suspect...what you suspect --

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Don't.

turns.speaker: RICKY TAN
turns.text: ... if your father were alive, I would be turning to him now.  I didn't blow up the American Embassy, but I believe some of my people did.  My enemies are trying to frame me.  There is a war going on within the Triads -- and I am going to lose.  My name has been written into the book of death.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: The police can protect you.

turns.speaker: RICKY TAN
turns.text: Nobody can protect me.  I'll make a deal with you, Lee.  But only iff you'll get me out of Hong Kong.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Tell me why they killed the customs agents.

turns.speaker: RICKY TAN
turns.text: There is a ship, in the Hong Kong Harbor...

turns.speaker: RICKY TAN
turns.text: You're just like your father, Lee.  All these years hiding behind his badge.  I wanted to help him, to share with him, but he was too afraid of change.  When you think about it, I didn't really kill him.  I just put him out of his misery.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Put the plates down.  It's over.

turns.speaker: RICKY TAN
turns.text: I don't think it's over.  There are casinos all over this country.  Let me make you a rich man, Lee.  Don't make the same mistake he did.

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: If you reach for that gun, I'm going to kill you.

turns.speaker: RICKY TAN
turns.text: Don't you remember?  I'm already dead.

turns.speaker: MASTER FU
turns.text: Didn't I teach you to always arch your back?

turns.speaker: LEE
turns.text: Yes, Master.
